title: Stars and Gods
text:
Stars and Gods is a collection of <a href="science%20fiction">science fiction</a> and <a href="non-fiction">non-fiction</a> by <a href="Larry%20Niven">Larry Niven</a> and edited by <a href="Jonathan%20Strahan">Jonathan Strahan</a>. it was first published in hardcover and in ebook form by <a href="Tor%20Books">Tor Books</a> in August 2010. A trade paperback edition was followed in August 2011 from the same publisher.
The book contains nine excerpts from longer works, fifteen works of short fiction, and seven short nonfictional works by Niven. A part of the book was written in collaboration with other authors, and it has a preface, fifteen introductions, and several of the pieces by the author. The book also includes an interview of Niven by <a href="Brenda%20Cooper">Brenda Cooper</a>.
